questions.quote: Alright, maybe it is, but listen, I gotta get ready - Sidra's coming over in a few minutes, so if you don't mind...
An Alan Mercer called for you. He said he's sorry, but he won't be able to make it tonight.  He's been stabbed.
Oh, Peterman ran off to Burma, and now he wants me to run the catalog.
Awright, let's see. How about Mug?  Mug Costanza, that's original.  Or uh, Ketchup? Pretty name for a girl.
Kramer, this is perfect. I need you to go in there, pretend you're a doctor and check this guy for moles.
Mr. Peterman, you have my deepest sympathies. Unfortunately, I've gotta get going.
Well, Jerry, I been thinkin'. I've gotten as far as I can go with George Costanza.
So now you want an apology for the apology, plus the original apology?
Yeah, that's normal.  Excuse me, sir. Could I have a look at that business section?
Yeah, yeah, I know.  Listen, Jerry, I can't let you come to my New Year's party.
